<title level="1" pfs="">[Weapon Master](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1449)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The weapon master is a deadly expert with their weapon of choice. Whenever possible, the weapon master engages an opponent one on one, and they prefer to begin combat unarmed and use their Swift Blow to catch a foe unawares.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 33

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Weapon Master](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1449)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 22</row>

**Perception** +23

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +26, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +24, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** +2

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [katana](/Weapons.aspx?ID=55)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72)_, _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [studded leather](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +24 

</row>

**HP** 250

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_katana_ +28 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=198), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d6+11 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_sling_ +22 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d6+11 bludgeoning

**Dueling Expertise**   The weapon master deals an extra 2d10 damage to creatures that are not adjacent to any allies or other foes.

**Swift Blow** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) **Requirement** The weapon master is not wielding a weapon; **Effect** The weapon master Interacts to draw a melee weapon without triggering reactions and makes a Strike with that weapon. The target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against this Strike. The weapon master deals an extra 2d8 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) with the Strike.

</column>
